sentence.Network_en: He is paralyzed as the result of a would - be assassin's bullet years ago.
sentence.Network_cn: 几年前有人对他行刺未遂,但子弹使他瘫痪了.

sentence.Network_en: But the very imminence of the emergency paralyzed his invention . Good!

sentence.Network_en: A stroke had paralyzed the entire left side of her body.
sentence.Network_cn: 中风使她的身体左侧完全瘫痪.

Sentence.sentence: They are afraid the normal social order will be paralyzed.
